name: Lucian
title: the Purifier
lore: Once a Sentinel of Light, Lucian is a grim hunter of undying spirits, pursuing them relentlessly and annihilating them with his twin relic pistols. Consumed by the need to avenge his dead wife, he will not rest until Thresh, the specter who holds her soul, is destroyed. Merciless and single-minded, Lucian allows nothing to stand in the path of this vengeanceâ€”anyone or anything foolish enough to try is blown away by an overwhelming barrage of magical gunfire.
blurb: Once a Sentinel of Light, Lucian is a grim hunter of undying spirits, pursuing them relentlessly and annihilating them with his twin relic pistols. Consumed by the need to avenge his dead wife, he will not rest until Thresh, the specter who holds her...
allytips: For optimal burst, try to combine Relentless Pursuit into Piercing Light.
Ardent Blaze actually explodes in a star pattern. Try to line it up so the spokes hit enemy champions.
Once you have chosen an angle for The Culling, you cannot change it. Pick your moment well!
Because of Lightslinger, Lucian benefits more from Attack Damage than he does from Attack Speed.
enemytips: Lucian has strong burst, but little sustained damage.
Lucian cannot change the aim of The Culling. Take advantage of this by avoiding the angle of the bullets.
Piercing Light does not give Lucian extra Attack Range. He still needs to find a target in range to line up his shot. Avoid Piercing Light by anticipating the angle Lucian will choose.

riot_spells.name: Piercing Light
riot_spells.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Shoots a bolt of piercing light through an enemy unit, damaging enemies in a line for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of bonus Attack Damage) physical damage.

Piercing Light's cast time decreases slightly as Lucian gains levels.

riot_spells.name: Ardent Blaze
riot_spells.description: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking and briefly revealing enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Fires a shot that explodes upon enemy contact or reaching the end of its path. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, marks enemies for 6 seconds, and briefly reveals them.

When Lucian or his allies damage a marked target, Lucian gains {{ e2 }} Movement Speed for 1 second.

riot_spells.name: Relentless Pursuit
riot_spells.description: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Quickly dashes a short distance.

Whenever Lightslinger hits an enemy, Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is reduced by {{ e1 }} second (doubles to {{ e2 }} seconds against champions).

riot_spells.name: The Culling
riot_spells.description: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
riot_spells.tooltip:
Lucian moves freely while firing rapidly in a single direction for {{ duration }} seconds. His shots collide with the first enemy they hit and each do {{ damageperbullet }} physical damage. The Culling does {{ percentdamageamptominions }}% damage to minions.

Lucian may use Relentless Pursuit during The Culling.

Reactivate The Culling to cancel early.

riot_passive.name: Lightslinger
riot_passive.description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.

i1.name: Lightslinger
i1.blurb: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After using an ability, '''Lucian's''' next [[basic attack]] within 3 seconds shoots twice, the second shot dealing {{as|{{pp|showtype=true|key=%|50 to 60|1;7;13}} AD {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}}}, increased to {{as|100% AD}} against minions.
i1.description2: The second shot applies [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|75}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}, increased to {{as|{{critical damage|100}}|physical damage}} against minions.
i1.description3: If '''Lucian's''' primary target is killed before the second shot can go off, he automatically shoots another enemy.
i1.notes:
* ''Lightslinger'' is triggered and consumed by the first attack.
* The second attack will prioritize enemy champions (even if hidden in fog of war or in brush) and enemy minions with low health.
** ''Lightslinger'' will still be consumed if no second target is found when ''Lucian'' fires.
* ''Lucian'' can move freely while firing ''Lightslinger'' since the second attack is integrated into the first one (like {{ai|Double Strike|Master Yi}}) and has special movement animations depending on the direction he is moving while firing.
* The second shot will not proc [[on-hit effect|on-attack effects]]  like {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} or {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}.

q1.name: Piercing Light
q1.blurb: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{pp|0.4 to 0.25}}-second delay, '''Lucian''' fires a laser in the direction of the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in a line.
q1.notes: * ''Piercing Light'' will attempt to lead the target if it is moving but does not adjust further during cast time (enemies can dodge the laser if they change their velocity by a sufficient amount during the delay).

w1.name: Ardent Blaze
w1.blurb: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.25}}-second delay, '''Lucian''' fires a shot that explodes in a cross pattern upon hitting an enemy or reaching the end of its path, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}.
w1.description2: Enemies hit are {{as|marked|buzzword}} for 6 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of them for the same duration.
w1.description3: '''Lucian''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 1 second if he or allied champions damage a {{as|marked|Buzzword}} target.
w1.notes:
* ''Lucian'' will not gain ''Ardent Blaze's'' bonus movement speed if attacks on {{as|marked|buzzword}} targets are {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen|blocked}}, or if he is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* ''Ardent Blaze's'' cross pattern will grant {{tip|sight}} of any {{ii|Control Ward}} hidden inside brushes.
* [[Damage over time|DoT]] will proc ''Ardent Blaze'' only once.

e1.name: Relentless Pursuit
e1.blurb: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.
e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} ''Relentless Pursuit's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 1 second for each {{ai|Lightslinger|Lucian}} shot landed, doubled to 2 seconds against enemy champions.
e1.notes: * {{ai|Lightslinger|Lucian}} does not interact with {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} when reducing ''Relentless Pursuit's'' cooldown.

r1.name: The Culling
r1.blurb: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lucian''' fires shots in the target direction for 3 seconds, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy they collide with. The damage is doubled against enemy minions.
r1.description2: While using ''The Culling'', '''Lucian''' cannot use [[basic attack]]s, {{ai|Piercing Light|Lucian}} or {{ai|Ardent Blaze|Lucian}}, but is {{tip|ghosted}}, can move freely, and can activate {{ai|Relentless Pursuit|Lucian}}. ''The Culling'' can only be interrupted by [[crowd control]] that prevents the ability to use basic attacks.
r1.description3: ''The Culling'' can be reactivated to end its effects prematurely.
r1.notes:
* ''Lucian'' '''does not''' [[channel]] during ''The Culling'' (he will keep firing while {{tip|silence|silenced}} and/or {{tip|blind|blinded}}).
* ''Lucian'' must be {{tip|airborne|displaced}}, {{tip|charm|charmed}}, {{tip|fear|feared}}, {{tip|taunt|taunted}}, {{tip|entangle|entangled}}, {{tip|stun|stunned}}, {{tip|suppression|suppressed}}, {{tip|disarm|disarmed}} and/or {{tip|polymorph|polymorphed}} in order to interrupt ''The Culling''.
* ''Lucian'' can activate {{si|Ghost}}, {{si|Flash}}, {{si|Barrier}}, {{si|Heal}} and {{ai|Relentless Pursuit|Lucian}} (as well as interact with {{ai|Dark Passage|Thresh}} or {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}}) without interrupting ''The Culling''.
* For the purposes of direction-based abilities ({{ai|Backstab|Shaco}}, {{ai|Mocking Shout|Tryndamere}}, {{ai|Petrifying Gaze|Cassiopeia}}) ''Lucian'' is facing in the direction he is moving and not the one his model is facing.
* Since ''The Culling'' is made up of two parallel [[skillshot]]s it is possible for enemies to take only half the damage (half of ''Lucian's'' shots) if they stand on the edge of ''The Culling's'' fire line.
* Even though each bullet can only hit one target, it will not proc {{ii|Muramana}} since ''The Culling'' applies spell effects as an {{tip|area of effect}}.
